version.description: The global semantic versioning for the project

sourceFolder.description: Default source folder for the Unicord System to locate your project. (Default to 'src')

componentFolder.description: Default component folder for the Unicord System to locate your components. (Default to 'app')

providers.description: Basic setup of external providers of your project.

databases.description: Set this to true to provide your project with builtin databases.

enabled.description: Set this to true to enable database system.

databaseProvider.description: Set this to your prefered databases. Available are 'Enmap', 'mySQL', 'postgreSQL', 'mongoDB', 'JSON', and 'Custom'

databaseConnection.description: Only set this if you're using remote databases.

port.description: Set to '0000' to use default port.

customDatabaseAPI.description: Point this to your Custom Database API directory. Set this to 'package:somepackagename' to use API provided by External and installed using npm.

prefix.description: A prefix that will be used throughout the Unicord Project
